text: James Oldaker (September 5, 1951 â€“ July 16, 2020) was an American rock music, blues rock and country music drummer and percussionist. He was born in Tulsa, Oklahoma. He was known for performing for Eric Clapton. He also recorded for The Bellamy Brothers, Asleep at the Wheel, Peter Frampton, Stephen Stills, Leon Russell, Ace Frehley, Freddie King, and the Bee Gees. Oldaker died on July 16, 2020 at the age of 68.Legendary drummer, Tulsa native Jamie Oldaker dies at 68 ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American rock drummers Category:Country musicians from Oklahoma Category:American blues musicians Category:Musicians from Tulsa, Oklahoma
title: Jamie Oldaker
